short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This program opens links to local resources (files and folders)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Program for open links to local files and folders.
It use following algorithm:
1) Install chrome extension. 
2) Install desktop app.
3) Chrome extension:
	a) analise site content, find strings looks like links to local files, e.g. "c:\windows"
	b) add to such strings new class;
	c) can copy such string to clipboard

4) Desktop application:
	a) Listen clipboard;
	b) If there is in clipboard string like links to local files it open it by Explorer or Total commander

This programs have some options.
Developer Page: https://xitsoft.ru/llinklight.php
